Class CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.Yeic.CustomerGui.CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment
  • Enclosing class:
    CustomerActivitiy

    private class CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment
extends Fragment
    This class is for making reservation or canceling it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment.Cancelreservation
      This class is invoking deleteReservation() method in DatabaseCustomerConnection, it is deleting according to user existsing reservation id.
      private class  CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment.CreateReservation
      This class is invoking createReservation() method in databaseConnection.
      private class  CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment.InsertComment
      This class is invoking insertComment() method in databaseConnection.
      private class  CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment.isReservationDatePass
      This class is searching for the user have reservation or not.It is invoking isReservationPass() method in DatabaseCustomerConnection.
      private class  CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment.RepickTables
      This class is invoking getTables() method in DatabaseCustomerConnection.
      private class  CustomerActivitiy.ReservationFragment.ReservationCheck
      This class is invoking isReservationExits() method in DatabaseCustomerConnection.
